data_table.description: Incident Vascular Dementia Status at DNA Blood Draw Date for Original Cohort and Offspring Cohort, Original and Offspring cohorts, blood drawn from 1974 to 2007. Vascular dementia is diagnosed when the dementia is thought to be due to vascular factors affecting the brain. The FHS criteria attempt to operationalize the NINDS-AIREN and ADDTC criteria for vascular dementia.

variable.name: Any_Inc_vad
variable.comment: No vascular dementia also includes those with incident non-vascular dementia.

variable.name: prob_inc_vad
variable.comment: No probable vascular dementia also includes those with possible but not probable vascular dementia.

variable.name: SURVDATE
variable.description: Date of vascular dementia diagnosis or date of censoring for those without vascular dementia
variable.comment: Those with incident non-vascular dementia are censored at date of dementia diagnosis. Number of days since Exam 1.
